title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
2 Points

  • 1 - for correct graph showing the relationship between demand and marginal revenue for the competitive firm

  • 1 - for correct graph showing the relationship between demand and marginal revenue for the monopoly firm
descriptions:
The student earns none of the following points:

  • 1 - for correct graph showing the relationship between demand and marginal revenue for the competitive firm

  • 1 - for correct graph showing the relationship between demand and marginal revenue for the monopoly firm

The student earns one of the following points:

  • 1 - for correct graph showing the relationship between demand and marginal revenue for the competitive firm

  • 1 - for correct graph showing the relationship between demand and marginal revenue for the monopoly firm

The student earns all of the following points:

  • 1 - for correct graph showing the relationship between demand and marginal revenue for the competitive firm

  • 1 - for correct graph showing the relationship between demand and marginal revenue for the monopoly firm

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 Point

  • 1 - for D=MR; the firm is a price taker and can sell all output at the market price
descriptions:
The student earns none of the following points:

  • 1 - for D=MR; the firm is a price taker and can sell all output at the market price

The student earns all of the following points:

  • 1 - for D=MR; the firm is a price taker and can sell all output at the market price

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
2 Points

  • 1 - for D(or P) > MR Explaining that the monopoly has control over price

  • 1 - for indicating that to sell additional units, price must be lowered on all units
descriptions:
The student earns none of the following points:

  • 1 - for D(or P) > MR Explaining that the monopoly has control over price

  • 1 - for indicating that to sell additional units, price must be lowered on all units

The student earns one of the following points:

  • 1 - for D(or P) > MR Explaining that the monopoly has control over price

  • 1 - for indicating that to sell additional units, price must be lowered on all units

The student earns all of the following points:

  • 1 - for D(or P) > MR Explaining that the monopoly has control over price

  • 1 - for indicating that to sell additional units, price must be lowered on all units
